longBusinessSummary: Hathway Cable and Datacom Limited provides cable television network and Internet services. The company operates through Broadband Business, Cable Television, and Dealing in Securities segments. It provides home and business broadband services. In addition, the company offers various entertainment and infotainment channels comprising of H-Tube, CCC Cine Channel, Hathway Music, Hathway Shoppe, and Hathway Life. Further, it is engaged in cable TV services business in cities and towns in India. Hathway Cable and Datacom Limited was incorporated in 1959 and is based in Mumbai, India.
